#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int Convert( int n, int b ) {
	
	char *s = new char[ 18 ];
	int len, i, j, sum = 0;
	
	sprintf(s, "%d", n );
	len = strlen( s );
	
	for( i = len - 1, j = 0;i >= 0;i--, j++ ) 
		sum += ( ( s[ i ] - '0' ) * ( (int)pow( b, j ) ) );
	
	delete s;
	
	return sum;	
}

int main() {
	
	int t, n, b, v;
	string str = "";
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d %d", &n, &b );
		v = Convert( n, b );
		str += ( char )v;
	}
	
	printf("%s\n", str.c_str() );
	
	return 0;
}
